Literature.Title: Amphipathic alpha helical antimicrobial peptides
Literature.Author: Giangaspero A, Sandri L, Tossi A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=10 µM,Human erythrocytes:55% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35(MIC=1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=1µM),Staphylococcus aureus 710A(MIC=4µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(MIC=2µM),Candida albicans(MIC=4µM),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=2µM),Aspergillus niger(MIC=>32µM)
